rules_text:
Effigy [i](As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a token that shares a card type with it. If you do, this spell costs {2} less to cast.)[/i]
Menace
When this creature enters, create a 1/1 red Parasite creature token with haste and “This creature can’t block”. Then if this spell was cast with effigy, populate. [i](Create a token that’s a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]
